overview: Moti Zharfati is a self-taught computer and web engineer and has been an active part of the web programing industry since 2001. Wanting to utilize his innate passion for computers and programming, he attained his first corporate position in 2004 as a web programmer at the leading Israeli website creation company, Guru4Rent. Soon afterwards Zharfati was drafted to an elite computer engineering unit of the Navy for his mandatory IDF military service. Upon completion of his military service Zharfati reentered the workforce as a freelance programmer and then went on to create his own company specializing in web programming and development- Keam Information Technologies- where he held the positions of Co-Founder and CTO. In 2010 Zharfati was recruited by Sorezki Ltd. to be the companyâ€™s CTO and manage the web programming for their various internet optimization and marketing web applications.
